thread.title: Bechem United to organize nationwide exercise to recruit young talents
thread.title_full: Bechem United to organize nationwide exercise to recruit young talents

title: Bechem United to organize nationwide exercise to recruit young talents
text:
Sports News | 9 October 2015 17:25 CET Bechem United to organize nationwide exercise to recruit young talents Bechem United 
Premier League side Bechem United will embark on a massive nationwide recruitment exercise later this month. 
The exercise will run from 22-28 October in Accra and Bechem for players between the ages of 17 and 23. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
